languages.text: "Жизнь у них не сахар, я забочусь о них как могу, но в тот момент был бессилен. Лишь однажды я чувствовал себя столь же беспомощным. Спасибо, что вступились за них, я не забуду. С тех пор как Эльси погибла, они — все что у меня есть".

"Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."
languages.original_text: "Жизнь у них не сахар, я забочусь о них как могу, но в тот момент был бессилен. Лишь однажды я чувствовал себя столь же беспомощным. Спасибо, что вступились за них, я не забуду. С тех пор как Эльси погибла, они — все что у меня есть".

traits.locale_text: "Their lives are difficult. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment I was powerless. Only once in my life did I feel so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them, I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

"Their lives are difficult. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment I was powerless. Only once in my life did I feel so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them, I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

"Their lives are difficult. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

"Their lives are difficult. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

"Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

languages.text: "Das Leben war hart zu den beiden. Ich sorge nach Kräften für sie, aber in diesem Moment war ich machtlos. Ich habe mich zuvor nur einmal so hilflos gefühlt. Danke, dass Ihr für sie eingetreten seid! Das werde ich nie vergessen. Seid Elsies Tod habe ich nur noch sie."
languages.original_text: "Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

traits.locale_text: "Das Leben war hart zu den beiden. Ich sorge nach Kräften für sie, aber in diesem Moment war ich machtlos. Ich habe mich zuvor nur einmal so hilflos gefühlt. Danke, dass Ihr für sie eingetreten seid! Das werde ich nie vergessen. Seid Elsies Tod habe ich nur noch sie."

languages.text: « La vie ne leur a pas fait de cadeau. J'ai beau m'efforcer de prendre soin d'elles, en l'occurrence, je n'ai rien pu faire. De toute ma vie, ça ne m'était encore arrivé qu'une seule fois. Merci d'avoir pris leur défense. Je ne l'oublierai jamais. Depuis qu'Elsie est morte, elles sont tout ce qui me reste. »
languages.original_text: "Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

traits.locale_text: « La vie ne leur a pas fait de cadeau. J'ai beau m'efforcer de prendre soin d'elles, en l'occurrence, je n'ai rien pu faire. De toute ma vie, ça ne m'était encore arrivé qu'une seule fois. Merci d'avoir pris leur défense. Je ne l'oublierai jamais. Depuis qu'Elsie est morte, elles sont tout ce qui me reste. »

languages.text: «La vida no las ha tratado bien. Normalmente hago lo que puedo por cuidar de ellas, pero en aquel momento me sentí impotente. Solo he estado así de indefenso en otra ocasión. Gracias por dar la cara por ellas. Jamás lo olvidaré. Son todo lo que me queda desde que murió Elsie».
languages.original_text: "Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

traits.locale_text: «La vida no las ha tratado bien. Normalmente hago lo que puedo por cuidar de ellas, pero en aquel momento me sentí impotente. Solo he estado así de indefenso en otra ocasión. Gracias por dar la cara por ellas. Jamás lo olvidaré. Son todo lo que me queda desde que murió Elsie».

languages.text: 「あの2人の人生は厳しいものでした。できる限り世話をしようとしたのですが、あの瞬間、私は無力でした。あれほどの無力感を覚えたのはあの時だけです。あの2人のために立ち上がって下さりありがとうございます。このことは決して忘れません。エルシーが死んで以来、私にはあの子たちしかいないのです」
languages.original_text: "Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

traits.locale_text: 「あの2人の人生は厳しいものでした。できる限り世話をしようとしたのですが、あの瞬間、私は無力でした。あれほどの無力感を覚えたのはあの時だけです。あの2人のために立ち上がって下さりありがとうございます。このことは決して忘れません。エルシーが死んで以来、私にはあの子たちしかいないのです」

languages.text: “她们两个的生活一直都很困难。尽管我一直在尽我所能地帮她们，但当时的情况下，我真的无能为力，这还是我第二次感到那么无助。谢谢您为她们挺身而出，这件事情我永远都不会忘记。埃尔茜死了之后，她们就是我最后的亲人了。”
languages.original_text: "Life has been tough for those two. I take care of them as best I can, but at that moment, I was powerless. There is only one other time I ever felt so helpless. Thank you for standing up for them. I will never forget this. Ever since Elsie died, they are all I have left."

traits.locale_text: “她们两个的生活一直都很困难。尽管我一直在尽我所能地帮她们，但当时的情况下，我真的无能为力，这还是我第二次感到那么无助。谢谢您为她们挺身而出，这件事情我永远都不会忘记。埃尔茜死了之后，她们就是我最后的亲人了。”
